body_html: Can you do some merging of the registration macros in scatter_op.cc? Certainly add and sub always have the same set of types, and for gpu it looks like everything has the same set of types. Taking advantage of this would dramatically shorten that section and make it easier to read and modify. For example, there would be only one #if GOOGLE_CUDA line in scatter_op.cc.
body_text: Can you do some merging of the registration macros in scatter_op.cc?  Certainly add and sub always have the same set of types, and for gpu it looks like everything has the same set of types.  Taking advantage of this would dramatically shorten that section and make it easier to read and modify.  For example, there would be only one #if GOOGLE_CUDA line in scatter_op.cc.
body: Can you do some merging of the registration macros in `scatter_op.cc`?  Certainly add and sub always have the same set of types, and for gpu it looks like everything has the same set of types.  Taking advantage of this would dramatically shorten that section and make it easier to read and modify.  For example, there would be only one `#if GOOGLE_CUDA` line in `scatter_op.cc`.
